description.x-y:
The user stares at the target with its baby-doll
eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move
always goes first.

The user stares at the target with its baby-doll
eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move
always goes first.

description.sword-shield:
The user stares at the target with its baby-doll
eyes, which lowers the target’s Attack stat. This move
always goes first.

effect.full: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
effect.shortEffect: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.
